label: 石帯
本: The Tale of Genji (Penguin Classics) . Viking Adult . 2001
説明文: A broad, black leather belt worn with the full-dress cloak (hō), with a row of squares or circles made of stone, jade, or horn set in it so as to show at the wearer’s back.  (A fold of the hō covered the front. )  The “stone” varied according to the wearer’s rank.[袍][Also read Shakutai][RK]
